title: Extroverted.
content: Always booted in interactive mode. Bubbly, curious, and never afraid to npm install a new challenge. Whether it’s people or problems, I run toward them (not away).

title: Intuitive.
content: I see the architecture before the blueprint. Love designing systems in my head before coding.Constantly learning, iterating, and mentally refactoring everything.

title: Feeling.
content: I believe good UX starts with empathy — even for 404s. I don’t just fix bugs, I think about how the user feels when they see one.

title: Judging.
content: My to-do list has a to-do list. I’ll git commit -m "organize life" without being asked. Love clean workflows, elegant pipelines, and knowing exactly what’s next.
